author: nero_eth
content:
### **EIP-7928 Breakout #9** call â€” [Dec 17, 2025, 14:00 UTC](https://github.com/ethereum/pm/issues/1841)
Countdown: <t:1765980000:R>
Location: Zoom (livestreamed on YouTube)

Agenda:
Discussion: 
* Specs update/clarification
  * https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/10895
  * https://github.com/ethereum/execution-specs/pull/1917
  * https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/10940#event-21604723354
    * How EL stores the BAL (CL vs EL) and for how long?
* Testing updates
* Client updates on optimizations

author: nero_eth
content:
Quick summary:
* The mentioned PRs were merged:
  * BAL taken out from the EL block
    * stored separately
    * new engine API methods
    * testing changes to keep BAL diff logs for debugging (cc <@796570016966770688> <@508125616940515329> <@762919002196410400> )
  * Retention period set to WSP (~5-10 GiB) to enable re-execution within the WSP

First devnet will be launched before the holidays without those latest changes included. cc <@577788234810130432>
